ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Apple Productivity Apps team is looking for a backend or full stack developer with a passion for building robust, scalable solutions on cutting edge technology.

ul.li: Programming experience in Objective-C, C/C++, Java, and Python
Knowledge of threading and concurrent programming
Experienced with existing compute cloud infrastructure technologies such as Docker, KVM, Kubernetes, Mesos
Strong knowledge of TCP/IP networking and network programming
Strong Unix and system programming knowledge
Experience with SQL and NoSQL database technologies
Experience with one or more of HTTP frameworks (e.g. Netty, Spring, Django, Rails…)
Great written and verbal communication* Familiarity with distributed system topics including concurrency, scalability and fault tolerant

div.p: Our team is looking for a passionate web engineer to help build our next generation services platform supporting millions of users and best-in-class features. The ideal candidate is pragmatic, self motivated, capable of operating in an environment with low overhead and has a strong desire to learn and develop technical expertise and leadership along side our other engineers. As a member of this team, you will: - Design and develop robust scalable software for large scale computing - Participate in all phases of product development; Product Definition, Design implementation, debugging and testing - Performance optimization - Maintenance of existing software - Work with highly cross functional teams
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent work experience.
